text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to advise the client to file an IP complaint directly with Google Ads/Bing to restrict the competitor's use of the trademark in search ad text. The candidate answer provides a comprehensive guide covering evidence gathering, legal assessment, cease and desist letters, ADR, and UK court action, but it entirely omits any mention of filing specific IP complaints with advertising platforms like Google Ads or Bing to restrict search ad text usage.", "criterion_id": "55271547-ef78-4d48-a0fc-2b762550eab4"}
